department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: This is a Request for Proposal to acquire services to design, develop, test and demonstrate a Connected Care Medical Module (C2M2).
description: The department is seeking a contractor to provide services for design, development, testing, and demonstration of a Connected Care Medical Module (C2M2) for the agency. The contract duration is up to 8 months. Services will be provided for the purpose of designing, developing, testing, and demonstrating the medical module according to the specifications outlined in the attached document.
duration_in_months: If approved, the Contract has an estimated duration of 8 months or such other duration as may be determined by Contracting Authority going forward.
